organization_url.title: Organization URL
organization_url.description: URL to the CRM system located in the Dynamics 365 cloud. Usually in format https://<organization>.crm.dynamics.com.

api_version.title: API Version
api_version.description: The API version, which will be used to query the data. For a list of available versions, please, refer to Microsoft's Web API documentation.

operation.title: Operation
operation.description: The API operation to be performed with the data. Check the documentation for more information.

continue_on_error.title: Continue on Error
continue_on_error.description: Marks, if the writer should continue writing data, if an error with any record occured.

validate_data.description: Validate input tables, if contains allowed fields for the operation.
